On a quarterly basis, settlement volume is around $8 trillion.

In other words, Ethereum has handled about twice the transaction volume of Visa in stablecoin settlements.

As a payments, treasury, and fund transfer infrastructure, the presence of stablecoins is becoming increasingly significant.

Ethereum is already establishing a clear position as real-demand infrastructure for payments and fund transfers.

Why Tomasz Didn‚Äôt Take Venture Capital Early On

On December 29, 2025, Tomasz Stanczak, Co-Executive Director of the Ethereum Foundation, said in an interview with ETHPanda that he did not deliberately reject fundraising. Instead, during the early stage of building core infrastructure such as an Ethereum client, the project was still immature and difficult to frame within a conventional fundraising narrative. Combined with his lack of a top-tier academic background and limited fundraising experience, he found it challenging to convince investors. Under these circumstances, he chose to bootstrap the project, validating his judgment through concrete technical progress rather than repeated explanations. Tomasz noted that while this path involved sustained pressure and significant challenges, being accountable primarily to the work itself‚Äîrather than to external capital‚Äîmade the pressure more manageable and better suited to the realities of early-stage core technology exploration.

Why waiting for the Privacy Layer is a win for the Mazze Ecosystem

The Reality Check
Transparency is one of our core pillars at Mazze. We must acknowledge the current state of the market: on-chain activity is low, and Ethereum volumes are at their lowest point since 2023. Launching a groundbreaking Mainnet when broader engagement is quiet would not do justice to the technology we‚Äôve built.

The Privacy Narrative
However, silence in the market does not mean silence in development. Shortly, we will be pushing the latest commits related to the Privacy Layer architecture to our GitHub repository. We have been closely monitoring the resurgence of the Privacy narrative, highlighted by the recent momentum of ZEC. It validates what Mazze was born to be: Fast, Secure, PoW and above all - PRIVATE.

Our Strategic Move
Instead of rushing, we are capitalizing on this time to accelerate the development of our Privacy Layer. We believe privacy is the next major priority for the blockchain space.

The Technical Advantage
By finalizing the Privacy Layer now, we can integrate it directly into the Mainnet launch. What does this mean for you?

- A fully featured chain from Day 1.
- No need for messy hard forks shortly after launch.
- No resyncing hassles for our node runners and miners.

Looking Ahead
We are not just waiting for the market to wake up; we are building the alarm clock. When Mazze Mainnet drops, it will be complete, private, and powerful.
